name: Flight Unlimited 2K18
description: Soar across the beautiful skies of the San Francisco bay area and Switzerland in Flight Unlimited 2K18.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: Intel Core 1.4Ghz i7 Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: Dedicated Graphics Card with 4GB of Memory Storage: 3 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: Intel Core 2.4Ghz i7 Memory: 4 MB RAM Graphics: Dedicated Graphics Card with 8GB of Memory Storage: 3 GB available space
